data.name: ENDURA Demo
data.detailed_description:
Welcome to ENDURA Demo, here, we'll introduce you to the beginning of the story starting with, Jack JR aka Bloody White Killer. You'll be playing as Jack who was chosen by ENDURA to become an Enduran. You will learn the basic mechanics and gameplay while experiencing a small chapter of a larger story told in ENDURA. Throughout the story, you will discover a bit about the world and the characters in it. Plus, you will also be introduced to other main cast, whom you will be able to play as, later in the game. We hope you'll enjoy the gameplay and the story.

Please, give us feedbacks, so we can improve the game further. We will work hard to implement your generous feedbacks. And if you like to support us, then please smash the beautiful green "wishlist button", we'll forever be thankful to you, and we'll try our very best to give you what you deserved!

Thank you!
data.about_the_game:
Welcome to ENDURA Demo, here, we'll introduce you to the beginning of the story starting with, Jack JR aka Bloody White Killer. You'll be playing as Jack who was chosen by ENDURA to become an Enduran. You will learn the basic mechanics and gameplay while experiencing a small chapter of a larger story told in ENDURA. Throughout the story, you will discover a bit about the world and the characters in it. Plus, you will also be introduced to other main cast, whom you will be able to play as, later in the game. We hope you'll enjoy the gameplay and the story.

Please, give us feedbacks, so we can improve the game further. We will work hard to implement your generous feedbacks. And if you like to support us, then please smash the beautiful green "wishlist button", we'll forever be thankful to you, and we'll try our very best to give you what you deserved!

Thank you!
data.short_description: ENDURA, a new experience by IFiO Studio where players engage in high-speed action, battling fantastical beasts, delivering seeds of a mystical tree world, and becoming the ultimate Endurans.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-bit required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4460, 3.20GHz or AMD FX™-6300
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 760 or AMD Radeon™ R7 260x (VRAM 2GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX® 9.0c)
  • Additional Notes: 1080p/30fps when graphics settings are set to "Low"
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-bit required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7 3770 3.4GHz or Intel® Core™ i3 8350 4GHz or AMD Ryzen™ 5 1500X
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 (VRAM 3GB) or AMD Radeon™ RX 570 (VRAM 4GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX® 9.0c or better)
  • Additional Notes: 1080p/30fps when graphics settings are set to "High"
